title: Brake Control Wiring Install: CURT 51323 Ford F-150
description:
This video depicts the Brake Control Wiring installation of the CURT brake control wiring harness, with quick plug, on the 2008 Ford F-150. 

Application Coverage:

1994 - 1996 Ford Bronco
1992 - 2008 Ford Econoline Van
2000 - 2005 Ford Excursion
1997 - 2012 Ford Expedition
2002 - 2011 Ford Explorer w/ Factory Tow Pkg. 
2004 - 2008 Ford F-150 New Body
2004 - Ford F-150 Heritage Edition
1997 - 2003 Ford F-150 & F-250 Light Duty
1999 - 2004 Ford F-250 & F-350 Super Duty
1999 - 2004 Ford F-250 & F-350 Heavy Duty
1994 - 1996 Ford F-150, F-250 & F-350
2009 - 2011 Ford Flex w/ Factory Tow Pkg.
1995 - 2003 Ford Windstar w/ Factory Tow Pkg.
2005 - 2009 Land Rover LR3
2010 - 2011 Land Rover LR3
2005 -2014 Land Rover Ranger Rover, Including Sport
2006 - 2008 Lincoln Mark LT
2010 - 2011 Lincoln MKT
1998 - 2012 Lincoln Navigator
2002 - 2010 Mercury Mountaineer

Special Notes:
-No tools required

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
-Need help or have some questions? Call Technical Support at 800.798.0813 (Monday-Friday 8am-7pm CST
tags: CURT Trailer wiring, trailer brakes, towing, how to install curt 51323, Ford, F150, F-150, F250, F350, Ford Flex, Ford Windstar Land Rover
